group_1.textLeft: Do you think that's where we buy it?

group_1.textRight: I guess so. Look, there's a line already.

group_1.textLeft: Have I got the right place?

group_1.textRight: Yo, Pops! Is this where you buy the@Chocolate of Fate?

group_1.textLeft: Hahah. Indeed it is, indeed it is!

group_1.textRight: So, the Chocolate of Fate is real?
I know, right? Sounds like a joke.
I mean, you see any chocolate anywhere?
And, uh, Pops? What do you think about @the shape of chocolate?
They all should be mushroom-shaped, right?

group_1.textLeft: Hahah, what a hectic day it is today, what@with all the customers here!

group_1.textRight: Shouldn't we join the line?

group_1.textLeft: Okay.

group_1.textRight: Hey, listen! If you've got the Chocolate of@Fate, why don't you up and sell it already?
(Maybe I can use it in a Valentine's design@for a new coat...)
(It'll give me some great fashion inspo!)
(When I blend those chocolates into my new@fashion...)
(And finish my chocolate-mushroom fusion@coat...)
(The entire world will open their eyes to@the most glorious shape of chocolate!)
[chara:300101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy](The mushroom!)

group_1.textLeft: Hahah. No need to rush.
Now then, raise your palms high up toward@the sky!
For that which you desire is already in@your hands.
We raise our hands up?

group_1.textRight: Really?
[chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-whoa! There's suddenly chocolate@in my hand!

group_1.textLeft: What? Where'd this come from? How did @he do that?

group_1.textRight: Wow!
There's chocolate in my hand, too! And it's @egg-shaped!

group_1.textLeft: How in the world is he doing that?!
Agh! Why's it so heavy?!
Why is my chocolate so much bigger than@all the others?!

group_1.textRight: So the Chocolate of Fate is egg-shaped,@not mushroom-shaped...
Wait! Maybe this is an egg-shaped@mushroom!

group_1.textLeft: Kako! This is getting really weird!
Chocolate's popping into our hands out@of thin air!
This man could be a Witch's minion or worse!

group_1.textRight: I don't feel any Witches or magic around@here...
Maybe he's a magicianâ€•
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
M-Madoka, your Chocolate of Fate!@It's enormous!
I've never seen chocolate this big in my@entire life!
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's like an egg laid by an elephant! I think@you've hit the jackpot!

group_1.textLeft: Uh, yeah.
H-ha ha... I guess I'm lucky?
(Why am I the only one who got this much@chocolate?)
(It's kind of embarrassing. It makes it look@like I'm greedy...)

group_1.textRight: Hey.
Down here.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200150:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: You're holding me in your hands...
...or trying to, at least.

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeSmall]Th-the elephant egg is talking!

group_1.textRight: ...??? The elephant what?
Hey. Hide me in your pocket already.
Wait, I won't fit.
Oh well, then hold tight onto me. Do NOT @let go, get it?
They're sneaks and rogues, the whole lot@of them.

group_1.textLeft: The eleph... I mean...the chocolate! @It's the chocolate!
Can't you hear it, Kako?

group_1.textCenter: Please take care on your way home.

group_1.textRight: He just...popped out of existence!

group_1.textLeft: What the?! I didn't even pay yet...

group_1.textRight: Eeek!

group_1.textLeft: An earthquake?!
Why's magic flooding in from everywhere?!

group_1.textRight: We're surrounded! Was it really a Witch @all along?!
Hide me now. Before it's too late.

group_1.textLeft: What?
